scripts.pretest: rollup -f umd -g d3-color:d3 -n d3 -o build/d3-cam16.js -- index.js
scripts.buildCam16Definition: rollup -f umd -g d3-color:d3 -n d3 -o build/cam16Definition.js -- test/cam16Definition-build.js
scripts.buildXyz2Rgb: rollup -f umd -g d3-color:d3 -n d3 -o build/xyz2rgb.js -- test/xyz2rgb-build.js
